Features

Combat
Parry: 10 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 17 (10) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Powered Scout Suit Shield: None Weapons: Laser Sword (d6+d6+8 AP 12); Molecular Knife (d6+d4+2 AP 2); Molecular Sword (d6+d6 AP 4); Unarmed (d6+d4)
Combat Notes:
Block: +1 Parry
Fighting Parry Modifier: +6 Parry
Martial Artist: +1 Unarmed damage Step
Molecular Sword Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d6
Tough As Nails: +1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Weapon Master: +1 Parry
Arcane Resistance: +2 Armor vs. arcane powers/+2 Trait resisting arcane powers
Arrogant+: Always takes on the biggest threat
Counterattack: May make a free -2 attack after a failed foe attack
Dodge: -1 foe ranged attacks, +1 evading area attacks
Extraction: Successful Agility negates attack of 1 foe during withdrawal
First Strike: May make a free attack when a foe moves into reach 1/rd
Frenzy: May make an additional Fighting attack each rd, suffering -2 on all attacks

Arcana Notes:

Arcane Background (Magic): Rolled 1 on Spellcasting die inflicts Shaken
